mapper.select: select s.serviceno "serviceNo", f.familyName "familyName", s.servicestarttime "serviceStartTime",s.serviceendtime "serviceEndTime",s.servicedate "serviceDate",s.servicestatus "serviceStatus",s.serviceno "serviceNo" from family f, serviceapply s, helper h where h.helperNo = s.helperNo and h.helperNo = #{helperNo} and s.servicestatus ='S01' and f.familyNo = s.familyNo
